cover.name: Default Quest
cover.author: Josh Maines
cover.description: This is the default story used as an example of how the engine works.

say.text: a man from the eastern coastal tribe of Talacora.
You were raised on the belief that the inner lands were barren,
but when you found out that another tribe was thriving in the west, you decided to investigate.

hurt.notice: You just got hurt for no reason!
